explains: adj. 谨慎的，周到的；小巧的，不引人注意的

sentences.en: They were gossipy and not always discreet.
sentences.cn: 他们爱说闲话，而且不总是言语谨慎。

sentences.en: Emporio Armani, the Italian fashion house, has made a discreet foray into furnishings.
sentences.cn: 意大利时装公司恩波利·阿玛尼已谨慎地涉足室内装饰业。

sentences.en: We were very discreet about the romance.
sentences.cn: 我们对这一段罗曼史守口如瓶。
